# InvocationDecoder

**Associated Type**

Type of [doc://com.apple.Swift/documentation/Distributed/DistributedTargetInvocationDecoder] that should be used when decoding invocations during [doc://com.apple.Swift/documentation/Distributed/DistributedActorSystem/executeDistributedTarget(on:target:invocationDecoder:handler:)] calls.

## Declaration

```swift
associatedtype InvocationDecoder : DistributedTargetInvocationDecoder where Self.InvocationDecoder.SerializationRequirement == Self.InvocationEncoder.SerializationRequirement
```
title: InvocationDecoder
